definition: reflex contraction of the sphincter muscle of the iris in response to a bright light (or certain drugs) causing the pupil to become smaller
details:
noun
- reflex contraction of the sphincter muscle of the iris in response to a bright light (or certain drugs) causing the pupil to become smaller
= synonyms: light reflex
- (genetics) cell division that produces reproductive cells in sexually reproducing organisms
= synonyms: meiosis, reduction division
